description: Awarded for boldly exploring new AI tools and demonstrating curiosity through hands-on learning.
Given for spotting errors or misleading answers from AI and calling them out with evidence.
Earned by fact-checking AI-generated content and busting myths through research and verification.
For identifying bias or unfairness in AI outputs and suggesting or making improvements.
Granted to those who demonstrate responsible AI use and protect themselves or their team from risky outcomes.
For bravely flagging suspicious, incorrect, or potentially harmful AI results to others.
Recognizes deep reflection on AIâ€™s ethical and societal impact.
For forming a collaborative, inclusive, and ready-to-build project team.
Given for crafting a bold team mission and defining a clear product vision or problem statement.
Awarded for researching competitors, identifying audiences, and mapping the opportunity space for your product.
For creating wireframes, mockups, or user journeys to guide product development.
Earned by generating outstanding visuals for your product using AI tools like Midjourney.
Given for writing, storyboarding, or producing a compelling video or narrative using Sora or similar AI tools.
For building and sharing your first working product prototype using Bolt, Cursor, or other AI/code tools.
For taking risks and creatively hacking together early prototypes or demos.
Awarded for successfully connecting and orchestrating multiple AI tools to enhance your product.
Given for collecting, sharing, and acting on user or team feedback to iterate and improve your project.
For deploying or launching your live site, MVP, or project update to a real audience.
Earned by delivering a standout product presentation, video pitch, or demo.
For experimenting with outreach, growth tactics, or using AI for marketing and user engagement.
Awarded to teams that overcome setbacks, adapt to change, and persist in the face of challenges.
For reflecting deeply on your learning journey, sharing insights, and inspiring others.
